videos.description: The Bucks unload 10 first-quarter 3-pointers on the Heat, tying the most in a quarter in playoff history.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Bucks scorch Heat with 10 1st-quarter 3-pointers) 2021/5/24 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Bucks scorch Heat with 10 1st-quarter 3-pointers

videos.description: Khris Middleton lobs to Giannis Antetokounmpo for the two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Middleton connects with Giannis for thunderous alley-oop jam) 2021/5/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Middleton connects with Giannis for thunderous alley-oop jam

videos.description: Bryn Forbes nails the 3-pointer while falling, his sixth of the night.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bryn Forbes drains his 6th 3-pointer of the game) 2021/5/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bryn Forbes drains his 6th 3-pointer of the game

videos.description: After a foul from Nemanja Bjelica, Giannis Antetokounmpo takes the time to work on his soccer moves with the basketball.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giannis practices his soccer moves mid-game) 2021/5/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giannis practices his soccer moves mid-game
